citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:20 am to 10 am on
May 19, 2022.
During this time the inspector knocked on doors, and waited at the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:20 am to 10 am on 
May 19, 2022. 
 
During this time the inspector knocked on doors, and waited at the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
